metadata.title: CVE-2024-41989 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Django 5.0 before 5.0.8 and 4.2 before 4.2.15.The floatformat template filter is subject to significant memoryconsumption when given a string representation of a number in scientificnotation with a large exponent.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-41989` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-django - 2:3.2.12-2ubuntu1.13
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:3.2.12-2ubuntu1.13').
